name: Sunny Cup Demo
description:
Sunny Cup is a drift-oriented racing game that is currently under development! Game features mountain drifting with intense battles in grassroots setups. No big arenas here, this is eurobeat pumping hills and local teams grinding endless hairpins. 

Get your controllers ready, this is the early demo and its all about local multiplayer. Invite your friends and make some space on the sofa, the mountain pass grinding is about to start!

Update (0.1.5.02): Minor update with bug fixes and added visible single player lap timer!
